about.details:
Incorporated in 2008, Enser Communications Limited offers Business Process Management (BPM) services to companies in the insurance, e-commerce, education and travel sectors.

Enser has 4 main business verticals:

  1. Customer Acquisition Services
  2. Customer services
  3. IT infrastructure management services
  4. Data management services

Under these verticals, the company provides business analytics, customer relationship management (CRM), interactive voice response systems (IVRS), customer interaction management solutions, technology-enabled infrastructure development, technology-enabled solutions - payment reminder/collection/subscription collection, process re-engineering, transaction monitoring systems, ERP implementation and maintenance, application development - customer relationship management, web chat services, application/transaction processing, debt collection, sales & lead generation, customer support, business process outsourcing (BPO) / business process management (BPM), knowledge process consulting, contact center, and customer acquisition services.

The company's clients include Acko General Insurance Limited, Ola Financials Services Pvt Ltd, Metis Eduventures Pvt Ltd, National Health Authority (Government), Reliance Nippon Life Insurance Company Ltd, Class 21A Technologies Pvt Ltd, Acko Technology & Services Pvt ltd, Girnar Finserv Pvt ltd, Gaadi web Private Limited, and G C web ventures Pvt Ltd.

As of December 31, 2023, the company had a total of 780 full-time employees.

faqs.question: What is the Enser Communications IPO?
faqs.answer:
Enser Communications IPO is a SME IPO of 2310000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹16.17 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹70 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on March 15, 2024, and closes on March 19, 2024.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Enser Communications IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Enser Communications IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Enser Communications IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Enser Communications IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Enser Communications IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Enser Communications IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Enser Communications IPO opens on March 15, 2024 and closes on March 19, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Enser Communications IPO?
faqs.answer: Enser Communications IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,40,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Enser Communications IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Enser Communications IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Enser Communications IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Enser Communications IPO will be done on Wednesday, March 20, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, March 21, 2024. Check the Enser Communications IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Enser Communications IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Enser Communications IPO listing date is on Friday, March 22, 2024.
